description:
Don’t let the stylish design fool you – these pants are made for trekking and climbing. Generous vents at the thighs and calves offer great breathability when you work up a sweat. Articulated knees and stretch-panel construction lend themselves to movement in the mountains, so if something were going to hold you back, it certainly wouldn’t be your pants.

  • Zippered vents at the thigh and calf help keep you cool
  • Stretchy panels help the pants move with you
  • Hard-wearing G-1000 Eco blends organic cotton with recycled polyester
  • Paneled construction reduces hot spots
  • 4 pockets help keep necessities close, while 1 internal zippered pocket keeps things safe
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Adjustable cuffs keep you ready for whatever your day brings
  • Regular fit for reliable comfort
name: Fjallraven Keb Trousers - Women's
